All blame for problems with this nuget package should be directed to Jewel Lambert. (Twitter: @dotnetlore)

This nuget package will create a 'Content\bourbon' folder in your project and place all bourbon-related files in this folder and its subfolders.

To use bourbon from an .scss file located in your Content folder, you add the following line to the top of the file:

@import 'bourbon/bourbon';
